home.title: Stalela — Phatha ibhizinisi lakho. Thina silawula i-admin.
home.description: Ukubhalisa inkampani, ukuthobela, kanye nosizo lwamabhange lwamabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika.

howItWorks.title: Kusebenza Kanjani — Stalela
howItWorks.description: Izinyathelo ezine ezilula ukusuka embonweni kuya enkampanini ebhalisiwe nethobela umthetho eNingizimu Afrika.

pricing.title: Amanani — Stalela
pricing.description: Amanani alula, asobala okubhalisa inkampani nezinsizakalo zokuthobela.

contact.title: Xhumana Nathi — Stalela
contact.description: Xhumana neStalela ukuze uthole usizo lokubhalisa ibhizinisi nokuthobela umthetho.

register.title: Bhalisa Ibhizinisi Lakho — Stalela
register.description: Qala ukubhalisa inkampani yakho neStalela. Gcwalisa imininingwane yakho sizokwenza konke okunye.

services.title: Izinsizakalo — Stalela
services.description: Ukubhalisa inkampani, ukuthobela, intela, amabhange, B-BBEE, izinsizakalo zobuchwepheshe, nokunye okwengeziwe kwama-SME aseNingizimu Afrika.

blog.title: Ibhulogi — Stalela
blog.description: Ulwazi, imihlahlandlela, nezindaba mayelana nokubhalisa ibhizinisi nokuthobela umthetho eNingizimu Afrika.

Nav.featuredDescription: Bhalisa i-Pty Ltd, i-NPC, noma i-CC ne-CIPC. Silawula ukugcinwa kwegama, ukulungiswa kwe-MOI, nokunikezwa kwesitifiketi.

Footer.tagline: Ukubhalisa inkampani, ukuthobela, kanye nosizo lwamabhange lwamabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika.

companyRegistration.title: Ukubhalisa Inkampani
companyRegistration.headline:
Bhalisa inkampani yakho
ngaphandle kwezinkinga.
companyRegistration.description: I-Pty Ltd, i-NPC, i-CC — silawula ukugcinwa kwegama le-CIPC, ukulungiswa kwe-MOI, nokunikezwa kwesitifiketi. Qala ibhizinisi lakho ngendlela efanele.

taxCompliance.title: Intela Nokuthobela
taxCompliance.headline:
Hlala uthobela.
Gwema izinhlawulo.
taxCompliance.description: Ukubhalisa kwe-SARS, ama-annual returns, i-UIF, i-Compensation Fund, ne-POPIA — sikugcina ohlangothini olulungile lomthetho.

banking.title: Amabhange Nezezimali
banking.headline:
Vula i-akhawunti yebhange
yebhizinisi, kalula.
banking.description: Ukulungiswa kwemibhalo nokudluliselwa emabhange ukuze uthole i-akhawunti yakho yebhizinisi ivulwe ngaphandle kokuphindaphinda.

certifications.title: Izitifiketi
certifications.headline:
Thola izitifiketi.
Wine amatenda amaningi.
certifications.description: Izitifiketi ze-B-BBEE, ubulunga be-NSBC, nesitifiketi se-Proudly South African — izitifiketi ibhizinisi lakho elizidinzayo.

techDigital.title: Ubuchwepheshe Nedijithali
techDigital.headline:
Amawebhusayithi, ama-app,
ama-brand ne-AI.
techDigital.description: Isitudiyo sedijithali esiphelele — ukwakhiwa kwamalogo, i-SEO, isoftware eyenziwe ngokukhethekile, ukuhlanganisa izinkokhelo, ama-app weselula, ama-chatbot, nokunye okuningi.

HomePage.servicesHeading: Konke ibhizinisi lakho elikudingayo ukuze lihlale likulayini ne-Stalela
HomePage.servicesSubheading: Kusuka ekubhaliseni kuya ekuthobeleni, amabhange kuya kuma-brand — simboza umjikelezo ophelele.
HomePage.howItWorksSubheading: Izinyathelo ezine ukusuka embonweni kuya ebhizinisini elithobela umthetho ngokugcwele.
HomePage.howItWorksImageAlt: Izinyathelo ezine zokubhalisa nokuphatha ibhizinisi lakho

1.title: Thumela imininingwane yakho
1.description: Sitshele ngebhizinisi lakho, abaqondisi, nalokho okudingayo.

2.title: Sibhalisa inkampani yakho
2.description: Silawula ukuthunyelwa kwe-CIPC, ukulungiswa kwemibhalo, nokulandelela.

3.title: Sikugcina uthobela
3.description: Izikhumbuzi ezizenzakalelayo nosizo lokufayela ama-annual returns, i-VAT, i-PAYE, nokunye okuningi.

4.title: Wena gxila ebhizinisini lakho
4.description: Phatha ibhizinisi lakho ngokuzethemba ngesikhathi thina silawula i-admin.

HomePage.ctaDescription: Qala ngemizuzu. Sizokuhola kulo lonke uhlelo.

HowItWorks.heading: Kusebenza kanjani
HowItWorks.description: Kusuka ekuthunyelweni kwakho kokuqala kwefomu kuya ekuthobeleni okuqhubekayo — nansi okumele ukulindele.
HowItWorks.imageAlt: Izinyathelo zokubhalisa ibhizinisi kuya ekuthobeleni okuqhubekayo

01.title: Thumela imininingwane yakho
01.description: Gcwalisa imininingwane yenkampani yakho, ulwazi lwabaqondisi, bese ulayisha imibhalo edingekayo. Ifomu yethu eqondisiwe yenza kube lula — akukho ulimi lwezomthetho, akukho ukuqagela.

02.title: Sibhalisa inkampani yakho
02.description: Ithimba lethu lihlola ulwazi lwakho, lilungise ukuthunyelwa, bese lifayela ne-CIPC egameni lakho. Uthola izibuyekezo kuzo zonke izinyathelo.

03.title: Sikugcina uthobela
03.description: Uma subhaliswe, sihlela ikhalenda yakho yokuthobela. Ama-annual returns, i-VAT, i-PAYE — silandelela izikhathi zokugcina sikusize ufayele ngesikhathi.

04.title: Wena gxila ebhizinisini lakho
04.description: Uma ukubhalisa kuphelile futhi ukuthobela kulawulwa, ungagxila ekukhuliseni ibhizinisi lakho ngesikhathi thina silawula i-admin.
details: Isitoreji semibhalo yawo wonke amarekodi akho

Pricing.heading: Amanani alula, asobala
Pricing.description: Khetha uhlelo olufanele ibhizinisi lakho. Akukho izindleko ezifihliwe.
Pricing.ctaDescription: Xoxa nathi sizokuphakamisa okungcono kakhulu kwebhizinisi lakho.

Contact.heading: Xhumana nathi
Contact.description: Unombuzo noma ulungele ukuqala? Singathanda ukuzwa kuwe.

Register.heading: Bhalisa ibhizinisi lakho
Register.description: Gcwalisa imininingwane yakho ngezansi nethimba lethu lizobuyela kuwe ukuze liqale uhlelo lokubhalisa.
Register.disclaimer: Ngokuthumela leli fomu, uyavuma ukuxhunyanwa ngezinsizakalo zeStalela. Asabelani ngolwazi lwakho nabanye.

Services.heading: Izinsizakalo zeStalela — Ukuphathwa Okuphelele Kwebhizinisi
Services.description: Konke okudingayo ukuqala nokuphatha ibhizinisi elithobela umthetho eNingizimu Afrika neStalela. Bhrawuza ngezigaba noma uchofoze noma iyiphi insizakalo ukuze uthole ukubuka okusheshayo.
Services.ctaDescription: Xhumana neStalela sizokusiza uthole izinsizakalo ezilungile zebhizinisi lakho.

CategoryPage.ctaDescription: Sivumele silawule i-admin ukuze ugxile ebhizinisini lakho.

ServicePage.ctaDescription: Xhumana nathi sizokuhola kulo lonke uhlelo.

Blog.heading: Ibhulogi
Blog.description: Ulwazi, imihlahlandlela, nezindaba zamabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika.

NotFound.heading: Ikhasi alitholakali
NotFound.description: Siyaxolisa, asikwazanga ukuthola ikhasi olifunayo. Kungenzeka liye lasuswa noma alikho.
